overview: Papa Jah, a Haitian gardener, has spent the last forty years in the Bahamas, living in a marginalised community named the Mud. When news arrives that his 103-year-old father has taken ill back in Haiti, Papa Jah fears he may not see him before he passes. Papa Jah travels back to Haiti, to his familyâ€™s small village on the island La Tortue, to reunite with his father, hopefully before it is too late.
title: My Father's Land
